name: Edge Direction Constraint
description: Align the direction of a trail or a deviation edge with a target vector.

inputParameters.name: edge_key
inputParameters.description: The key of a COMPAS CEM trail or deviation edge.

inputParameters.name: weight
inputParameters.description: The weight of the constraint in the optimization problem. Defaults to one.

outputParameters.name: constraint
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM edge direction constraint.
